QuestData.Title: Boom Goes the Doonamite!
QuestData.Description: It's an emergency!$b$bLooks like you stirred up a hornet's nest killin' all them fish-folk.$b$bThey're conductin' a full-on counterattack on Grookin Hill!$b$bI was hopin' to get some R&D time, but we're gunna hafta put my methane-grenade theory to work right away!$b$bMeet me on the east side of the fort, and bring yer throwin' arm!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Rivett east of Grookin Hill. Use his Methane Grenades to fend off the Jinyu attack.
